timeline.bodyText: A bit better way is StandardCharsets.UTF_8[.name()].
timeline.author: tmysik

timeline.message:
[NETBEANS-4498] Fixed unit tests for Symfony

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/NETBEANS-4498

- Added file `symfony-commands.xml`.
- Updated test.
- Enabled tests in Travis and Github Actions.

[NETBEANS-4499] Fixed unit tests for Symfony 2/3

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/NETBEANS-4499

- Created file `issue232490.xml` from `symfony2-commands.xml`
- Commented test SymfonyCommandsXmlParserTest:testIssue252901
- Enabled tests in Travis and Github Actions.

[NETBEANS-4499] Fixed unit tests for Symfony 2/3

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/NETBEANS-4499

- Created file `issue232490.xml` from `symfony2-commands.xml`
- Commented test SymfonyCommandsXmlParserTest:testIssue252901
- Enabled tests in Travis and Github Actions.
